name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiris
description: Recipe video above. The most incredible real strawberry flavour - the ultimate strawberry daiquiri! Skip the ice - it dilutes the flavour. This frozen daiquiri has the perfect slushy consistency, and it's dangerously drinkable - there's a fair slug of booze in this but you can't taste it!
recipeIngredient: 60g/ 2 oz   fresh strawberries (, leaves removed (4 strawberries, Note 1))
Fresh strawberries (, cut slit in base)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a blender or Nutribullet.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all ingredients in a blender or Nutribullet.

recipeInstructions.text: Blitz until all strawberries are blitzed.
recipeInstructions.name: Blitz until all strawberries are blitzed.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust sweet with more syrup, sour with lime (and booze if you dare!).
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust sweet with more syrup, sour with lime (and booze if you dare!).

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glasses (see video for consistency) and serve, garnished with fresh strawberries!
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into glasses (see video for consistency) and serve, garnished with fresh strawberries!

review.reviewBody: Another deliciously simple recipe, great flavour and consistency- a refreshing summer cocktail

Yum! Followed recipe exact BUT substituted rum for a non alcoholic version (highly recommend Sans Bar ‘Summer Carnivale’) - just as amazing as the ‘real’ thing and perfect for anyone who does not or can not drink as they can join the party and not miss out on any of the yummy-ness. Going to try it with mangoes next :)
Wonderful on a hot day! Tasty. Ideal consistency with the frozen and the fresh strawberries. Used a bit of Cointreau too.
Nagi these are dangerous! I've had one twice in two nights. Perfect summer drink. I used all frozen strawberries as I like the thicker cold taste.
This recipe is amazing and I have made it multiple times.
Wowza, giant steps above your ordinary strawberry daiquiri. In addition to amazing strawberry taste, the color is so beautiful.  I substituted agave nectar for the simple syrup.
Just made these to make isolation less of a drag. Did not have enough white rum, so used half white, half raspberry. No fresh strawberries as not been shopping... but the result was a dream!

keywords: frozen daiquiri, Frozen strawberry daiquiri, strawberry cocktail
